name: DinoRun (Scayze, chrisrehm)
description:
DinoRun! Based on xkcd#650 : Nowhere:

Did you ever imagine to just ride away on a mighty apatosaurus from any situation? Well, probably not. But now you can literally do just that! Come on in, join this adventure! Kick away bombs, dodge spikes, and collect coins which will unleash the power of the rainbow! It's gonna be a-m-a-z-i-n-g!

Sadly, music and sound don't work in the browser version of the game :| But fear not! You can find a download of the windows executable below, if you want to check it out. (and you should)

This project was a two man effort, Chris doing design and sound, and me piecing everything together.

Made with the glorious Godot engine! (check it out!) And the source files are available over on my github!
